original_text: His son by the slave woman was born according to the flesh, but his son by the free woman was born as the result of a divine promise.
korean_text: 여종에게서는 육체를 따라 났고 자유 있는 여자에게서는 약속으로 말미암았느니라

sentences.original_text: His son by the slave woman
was born according to the flesh
but his son by the free woman
was born as the result of a divine promise
